tha-ap389:0.3_0: Held together by layman, sometimes heated;
tha-ap389:1.2_0: like the moon on the fifteenth day.
tha-ap389:1.4_0: and he saw the world speedless.
tha-ap389:2.2_0: to whom I gave the Teacher.
tha-ap389:2.4_0: I bowed down to her and left.
tha-ap389:3.1_0: The lie down on the same sheet
tha-ap389:3.2_0: whatever fruit he enjoyed the fruit,
tha-ap389:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap389:3.4_0: and the fruit of good and results.
tha-ap389:4.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
tha-ap389:6.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap389:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kakuṭi.
tha-ap389:8.1_0: The seventh, the senior monk with fruit,
